definition: an expressive style that uses fictional characters and events to describe some subject by suggestive resemblances
details:
noun
- an expressive style that uses fictional characters and events to describe some subject by suggestive resemblances
- a story which can be interpreted to reveal a hidden meaning, usually a moral or political one.
= example: a story which can be interpreted to reveal a hidden meaning, usually a moral or political one.
= synonyms: fable, parable, apologue
- a visible symbol representing an abstract idea
= synonyms: emblem
